Package org.spongepowered.api.world.volume

Class EntityHit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.world.volume.EntityHit
  • public class EntityHit
extends java.lang.Object
    The result of an intersection between a ray and an entity.

    • Constructor Summary
